summary.span: Creates *wrapped* objects.

span.span: Creates *wrapped* objects.

summary.span: Each wrapped object contains the information for one member (field, property, or method), together with a copy of the instantiated object that the member is defined on.

span.span: Each wrapped object contains the information for one member (field, property, or method), together with a copy of the instantiated object that the member is defined on.

summary.span: This enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.

span.span: This enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.
